metadata.title: CVE-2019-11675 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The groonga-httpd package 6.1.5-1 for Debian sets the /var/log/groongaownership to the groonga account, which might let local users obtain rootaccess because of unsafe interaction with logrotate. For example, anattacker can exploit a race condition to insert a symlink from/var/log/groonga/httpd to /etc/bash_completion.d. NOTE: this is an issue inthe Debian packaging of the Groonga HTTP server.

criterions.comment: groonga package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
